item.title: I am sorry, I apologize repeatedly.
item.description:
Life’s been hectic, hence the radio silence on the blog! I know you’re all dying for more of my posts. ðŸ˜‰ The truth is, I’ve been navigating a whirlwind of changes lately, but I’m embracing it all with my new motto: “Change is fun!” First off, Aubrey celebrated her first birthday on January 10th! She’s already walking, attempting to run, and keeping us on our toes. Secondly, after nearly a decade, I’ve bid farewell to The Knaster Technology Group and embarked on a new journey with BKD Technologies in Kansas City...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/i-am-sorry-i-apologize-repeatedly/
